Reference: Siegel et al. {Siegel2015a}, Bar-Even et al. {Bar-Even2016a}
Berg et al. {Berg2007a}, Schomburg et al. {Schomburg2017a}

Reaction: Acetyl-CoA + NADH + H2 → acetaldehyde + CoA + NAD+
Glycolaldehyde + NAD+ + H2O → Glycolate + NADH + H+
Malate + CoA → Acetyl CoA + H2O + Glyoxalate
Pyruvate + CO2 + NADH + H2→ Malate + NAD
